name: Portal Issue
description:
Portal Issue is a turn-based strategy featuring non-combat constructional robots. They try to find repair parts for the portal in dangerous locations to get off the planet where their spaceship has crashed.

Features:

  • Explore different mechs with special abilities 
  • Apply indirect damage and stun to dangerous enemies
  • Manage movement and action capabilities to achieve the goal and get out of the skirmish
